job.title: Software Dev QA Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer & Network Security,Computer Software
job.description:
Job Description
Fortinet is developing a powerful platform that combines the security for Enterprise, Datacenter and carrier solutions that enables organizations to efficiently manage, scale and secure their networks. The Software Development QA Engineer will be part of this exciting development and will be working with a strong technical team that has experience delivering NGFW solutions. Participate in building a IPS platform for Enterprise/Data centers/Carriers that provides high throughput packet processing using latest networking technologies.
Job Duties
Execute functional/performance testing on products using a combination of manual and auto-testing techniques
Focus on Fortigate firewall product test
Create, maintain and execute test cases as well as scripting
Reproducing and troubleshooting the bug with developer
Collaborate closely with the development team to analyze, debug and resolve any issues
Troubleshoot customer's issue
Passionate, motivated and always willing to learn and explore new technologies
Good team player
Job Experience Required
Solid knowledge of Networking Technology, especially Layer 2, 3 and 4, including VLAN, STP, LACP, VRF, RIP, OSPF, BGP, VRRF, HA redundancy, TCP, UDP and etc.
Operations experience in Unix/Linux environment is essential
Good Understanding of security technologies like firewall, IPS, Authentication, VPN and etc.
Automation experience using Python
Hands-on Experience in one or more of the firewall product Fortinet/Juniper/Sourcefire/Checkpoint/PaloAlto etc is a plus
Demonstrated knowledge and trouble-shooting experience on most used techniques or networking protocols, Routing protocols.
Experience in handling customer issues is a plus
Experience in using Spirent or Ixia traffic generator is a plus
Ability to work in collaborative environment and communicate well with other departments
Ability to work on tasks under tight time constraints
Hands on experience of Networking/firewall features, system level or equivalent experience on deploying and configuring Networking/firewall devices is a plus
Have any networking certification like Fortinet NSE, CCNA, CCNP, CCIE, JNCIS, JNCIP, JNCIE etc is a plus.
Educational Requirements
Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related field

About Us
Fortinet (NASDAQ: FTNT) secures the largest enterprise, service provider, and government organizations around the world. Fortinet empowers its customers with intelligent, seamless protection across the expanding attack surface and the power to take on ever-increasing performance requirements of the borderless network - today and into the future. Only the Fortinet Security Fabric architecture can deliver security features without compromise to address the most critical security challenges, whether in networked, application, cloud or mobile environments. Fortinet ranks number one in the most security appliances shipped worldwide and more than 450,000 customers trust Fortinet to protect their businesses.
